sections.title: Reset local cache
sections.content:
The official Notion wiki provides a guide for Windows and Mac, but not for Linux since only the web browser version is provided and no native version.

If you have to reset the locally cached Notion data because of technical bugs, delete all the content of the ~/.config/Notion folder. On next startup of Notion, you will have to log in again. The data will be fetched fresh from Notion servers.
